questions: Is there a hamster in the image?
Is there a wheel in the image?
Is the hamster running on the wheel?
model_output:
Yes, there is a hamster in the image; it is prominently visible at the center of the frame.
No, there is no wheel in the image; only the hamster and part of its cage are visible.
No, the hamster is not running on the wheel as there is no wheel present in the image.
